pages.text: Traits of a timeship are related to their personality and cannot be directly found out, other than experimentation. However, there is not that much traits, and a TARDIS can have up to 4 traits
Zoophobia is not that common in Timeships, as they often seem to enjoy any kind of company, especially after being left for an extreme amount of time, to rot...
pages.title: Zoophobia

pages.text: A quite common characteristic for timeships, they enjoy being around tamed animals
pages.title: Pet Enthusiast

pages.text: The introverted timeships feel extremely uncomfortable when in close proximity(16 blocks) of another TARDIS
pages.title: Introverted

pages.text: The extroverted timeships are very sociable and enjoy being in close proximity(16 blocks) of another TARDIS
pages.title: Extroverted

pages.text: Some timeships seem to be afraid of water, and hate it to an extreme, although it only affects them being in water, not near it
pages.title: Hydrophobic

pages.text: An annoyingly common trait, Timeships with it show utter discontent with seeing the sky
pages.title: Agoraphobia

pages.text: A relatively uncommon, yet understandable trait, some Timeships hate being in enclosed spaces after being stuck in caves for millenia
pages.title: Claustraphobic

pages.text: An Arachnophobic Timeship shows extreme fear and discontent when there is a spider very close to it's outer shell(8 blocks)
pages.title: Arachnophobia

pages.text: While a Timeship can't exactly be 'Cold Blooded', they surely can dislike a specific kind of biome, for this one, it's cold ones they don't like
pages.title: Cold Blooded

pages.text: Timeships are considered pyromaniacs when they exhibit specific positive emotions around lava or fire...
pages.title: Pyromaniac

pages.text: Some specific Timeships enjoy taking a bath in water, they also prioritize landing in water when possible...
pages.title: Wet

pages.text: Timeships that exhibit this trait seem to have taken to the ways of old-timey monks, disliking any violance unless it's safe defense
pages.title: Peaceful

pages.text: Some very odd Timeships enjoy the sight of blood, and when it's pilot actually kills a sapient creature, it will become more loyal and happy, telling you it's happy...
pages.title: Murderous

pages.text: The Jealous kinds of Timeships seem to have favourite pilots, and are extremely jealous about them, loosing loyalty and mood if they betray them by flying a different TARDIS, but becoming very happy when they are the only one
pages.title: Jealous
